Key Match Events: England was dismissed for 103 all out from 16.4 overs
Rohit Sharma hit a fine fifty for India
Pre-Game Insights: India captain Rohit Sharma stated, 'It's very satisfying to win this game. We worked really hard as a unit.'
Post-Match Reflections: England captain Jos Buttler said, 'India outplayed us, certainly. We let them maybe get 20/25 too many on a challenging surface that they played well on. They fully deserved to win.'
Phil Tufnell commented, 'England managed to scratch their way to the semi-finals, then it all came tumbling down. I can only give them a four or five out of 10 for this World Cup.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: South Africa will face India in the final in Barbados on Saturday at 15:30 BST
England's chase of 172 looked difficult given the conditions and India's spinners were unplayable
India's spinners took crucial wickets including Jos Buttler, Moeen Ali, and Jonny Bairstow
